languages.text: "Принято". {n}Проктор с хрустом разминает пальцы.{/n} "Прикройте Глейто, пока я занят".
"Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne cracks his knuckles.{/n} "Take care of Glaito while I am busy."
languages.original_text: "Принято". {n}Проктор с хрустом разминает пальцы.{/n} "Прикройте Глейто, пока я занят".

languages.text: «Entendido». {n}Solomorne se cruje los nudillos.{/n} «Cuide de Glaito mientras me encargo de ello».
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne cracks his knuckles.{/n} "Take care of Glaito while I am busy."

traits.locale_text: «Entendido». {n}Solomorne se cruje los nudillos.{/n} «Cuide de Glaito mientras me encargo de ello».

languages.text: “了解。”{n}索罗蒙的指节噼啪作响。{/n}“等我忙起来的时候，替我照顾好格雷托。”
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne cracks his knuckles.{/n} "Take care of Glaito while I am busy."

traits.locale_text: “了解。”{n}索罗蒙的指节噼啪作响。{/n}“等我忙起来的时候，替我照顾好格雷托。”

languages.text: 「わかりました」{n}ソロモーンは指の関節を鳴らす。{/n}「忙しい間、グライトの世話を頼んでください」
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne cracks his knuckles.{/n} "Take care of Glaito while I am busy."

traits.locale_text: 「わかりました」{n}ソロモーンは指の関節を鳴らす。{/n}「忙しい間、グライトの世話を頼んでください」

languages.text: « Entendu. {n}Solomorne fait craquer ses articulations.{/n} Je vous confie Glaito. »
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne cracks his knuckles.{/n} "Take care of Glaito while I am busy."

traits.locale_text: « Entendu. {n}Solomorne fait craquer ses articulations.{/n} Je vous confie Glaito. »

languages.text: "Anlaşıldı." {n}Solomorne parmaklarını çıtlatıyor.{/n} "Ben vazifemi yerine getirirken Glaito'ya göz kulak olun."
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged." {n}Solomorne cracks his knuckles.{/n} "Take care of Glaito while I am busy."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşıldı." {n}Solomorne parmaklarını çıtlatıyor.{/n} "Ben vazifemi yerine getirirken Glaito'ya göz kulak olun."

languages.text: "Verstanden." {n}Solomorne knackt mit den Knöcheln.{/n} "Kümmert Euch um Glaito, während ich beschäftigt bin."
